text:

text:
"Senator Mike Crapo's 2019 Max Out Package"

Here's what $15,000 will in part buy you:

* Fishing trip in Maryland w/ @MikeCrapo 
* Dinner or lunch w/ Crapo
* Reception in D.C. w/ Crapo
* "Dinner with banking sub committee chairs"
* Two tickets to "Annual Idaho Potato Fest"
